entry.title: Saturday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy. Blowing snow. Wind northwest 60 km/h gusting to 80. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 32 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clearing. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Clearing late this evening. Blowing snow this evening. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 late this evening. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 26 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
